name: Blinded
description: Blinded by triffid spit! Significant penalties to movement, attack and defence.

name: Cursed
description: Cursed! -2 to all stats and saving throws and -20% to damage resistance for 5 turns.

name: Defensive Stance
description: Defensive Stance provides +2 Strength, +4 Constitution, +2 Saving Throws, and +4 Armor Class for 3 turns, but the Dwarven Defender becomes rooted to the spot for the duration.

name: Disease
description: You have been infected by a disease, and have reduced stats.

name: Endure Elements
description: 25% resistance to cold and heat damage.

name: Fury
description: +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, and +2 Will saving throws.

name: Greater Elemental Resistance
description: 70% resistance to heat and cold damage.

name: Hasted
description: The character is hasted, gaining one attack and three additional movement squares for five rounds.

name: Healed
description: Heals 2-4 HP for every level of the Paladin up to level 10.

name: Heroism
description: +2 to attack rolls and all saving throws for 20 turns.

name: Insect Swarms
description: A swarm of biting insects! In addition to immediate damage, this causes penalties to attack and defence for 4 rounds.

name: Minor Curse
description: Minor curse! Reduces attack by 1 and standard damage by 20%.

name: Protection
description: Protection: -2 Armor Class and +2 to all saving throws.

name: Rage
description: +2 Strength, +2 Constitution, +2 Will saving throws, -2 Armor Class, -2 Dexterity.

name: Slowed
description: Character is slowed, losing one attack and 3 movement squares per round for five rounds.
